sentences.english: In other words, "turtle" and wife must be unchaste .
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，“龜”的老婆一定是不貞潔的。

sentences.english: This religion emphasizes chasteness in women and men.
sentences.chinese: 這個宗教強調男女的貞潔。

sentences.english: Many media coverage praised her as saving her infidelity, or just refused humiliation.
sentences.chinese: 很多報道稱讚她，說她爲守貞潔，寧死不辱。

sentences.english: Jack: The Virgin Cliffs. Nice name for a Virtuous mission.
sentences.chinese: 貞女崖？這名字跟貞潔行動倒很配。

sentences.english: Little did he know that he had offended the virgin goddess.
sentences.chinese: 他不知道他已經冒犯了這位貞潔的女神。

sentences.english: I am sure he is chaste as the moon is.
sentences.chinese: 我確信他是貞節的人，就像月亮一樣貞潔。

sentences.english: She had committed a fault, but the foundation of her nature, as will be remembered, was modesty and virtue.
sentences.chinese: 她犯了錯誤，但是我們記得，她的本質是貞潔賢淑的。

sentences.english: Wholly pure sentiments are to be found only in women who are wholly chaste.
sentences.chinese: 只有真正貞潔的女人才談得上真正純潔的愛情。

sentences.english: But when tears stained thy robe of vestal-whiteness.
sentences.chinese: 貞潔的白袍沾滿了你的淚痕。

sentences.english: If you're not chaste and pure, you won't experience the resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不貞潔，潔淨，就不會經歷復活。

sentences.english: Now he has slandered her and said, 'I did not find your daughter to be a virgin.'
sentences.chinese: 信口說她，說，我見你的女兒沒有貞潔的憑據。

sentences.english: The vow of chastity creates only a prohibitory impediment to marriage.
sentences.chinese: 該發誓的貞潔創造只是一個禁止性障礙婚姻。

sentences.english: That the first entrance of the holy synaxis is a symbol of the virtues of the soul.
And many worthy and chaste dames even thus, All guiltless, meet reproach.
sentences.chinese: 許多貞潔賢淑的娘兒們，都是這樣蒙上了不白之冤。

definition: to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
